meanings.definition: Of or relating to the ostrich or similar birds.
meanings.sent1: The struthious feathers of the bird helped it blend into the grassy savannah.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper admired the struthious features of the ostrich as it ran across the enclosure.
meanings.sent3: The struthious dance moves of the ostrich made the visitors giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her long, struthious neck reached out to grab the tasty leaves from the tree.
meanings.sent5: The struthious legs of the bird were powerful and swift, propelling it forward.
